pr_title: chore: Adds README for running the samples

timeline.author: olavloite
timeline.diffHunk: @@ -0,0 +1,46 @@ +# Getting Started with Cloud Spanner and the Google Cloud Client libraries + + + + +[Cloud Spanner][Spanner] is a horizontally-scalable database-as-a-service +with transactions and SQL support. +These sample Java applications demonstrate how to access the Spanner API using +the [Google Cloud Client Library for Java][google-cloud-java]. + +[Spanner]: https://cloud.google.com/spanner/ +[google-cloud-java]: https://github.com/googleapis/java-spanner

replies.bodyText: Yes, thanks, I will fix this one.
replies.author: thiagotnunes
